content.question: Which of the following can be used to explain why an immigrant community that attempts to assimilate into local society would engage in political protest against the government?

choices.label: Sponsored refugees brought to a city far from their point of entry
New immigrants relying on friends and family for chain migration
Ethnic groups living in segregated enclaves
The division of land based on traditional land survey systems

content.answer: Ethnic groups living in segregated enclaves

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
